title: Gardens of Japan
brief_description: Some of the scenic beauty of Japan - in nature and in the highly cultivated and famous gardens in Tokyo and Kyoto; a variety of gardens which have been planned and cultivated to please both the mind and the eye, including those using sand and stone to represent natural landscapes and which have symbolic signifance. A short sequence shows the traditional tea ceremony. A revised version of Title Codes 004193 and 004194.
